scrambleText: I turn ideas into digital reality.
I invite you to be part of my digital world!

about.title: About Me
about.paragrah1: I'm a full-stack developer focused on creating innovative digital experiences.
about.paragrah2: In my portfolio, I invite you to explore my notable skills and projects in web development, including custom applications, user management systems, and e-commerce sites.
about.paragrah3: I work as part of a team to design creative and effective solutions.
about.paragrah4: I have a strong command of key technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, as well as cutting-edge frameworks like React and runtime environments like Node.js. These tools enable me to create dynamic and highly scalable web applications.
